name: Space Invasion II
overview: An updated version of Space Invaders for the Amiga by Kevin Gallagher and released in 1994. Kev has made several versions of this game, this one is marked Space Invasion II and features the 4 barriers at the bottom that provide cover for your ship...for a time. Red Alert! The invaders are attacking! Your mission is to kill the invading alien scumbags before they invade earth. Use your moue or joystick to control your lazer and waste as many of the blighters as you can. This version also features 50 invaders per level. It was also published in IDG Media's Amiga Action Issue #69, Cover Disk 2.
